docs.snippet: A Florida-based sports agent and a trainer ran legitimate businesses aimed at getting Cuban baseball players to sign U.S. major league contracts but were not involved with smuggling players from the communist island or falsifying travel documents,...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida-based sports agent and a trainer ran legitimate businesses aimed at getting Cuban baseball players to sign U.S. major league contracts but were not involved with smuggling players from the communist island or falsifying travel documents, their lawyers told a federal jury Wednesday.

headline.main: Lawyers: Sports Agent, Trainer Deny Cuban Player Smuggling
headline.print_headline: Lawyers: Sports Agent, Trainer Deny Cuban Player Smuggling
